channel.title: LunarRising - Need Staff - New Server - 317 - Customs!
channel.description:
Hello, I am Pluto the owner of LunarRising! We are a new uprising server that has just begun and we are looking for various players and staff! This advertisement will be kept brief so you can join us ASAP! If you want spoilers here are some. I made them only the link so they wouldnt be easily spoiled.
Screenshot by Lightshot Screenshot by Lightshot Screenshot by Lightshot Screenshot by Lightshot Screenshot by Lightshot
Server Website: LunarRising - Index
In a Rush? Here's the Jar! https://www.dropbox.com/s/3jvec6v33o...ising.jar?dl=0

item.title: LunarRising - Need Staff - New Server - 317 - Customs!
item.dc:creator: @wimstr wimstr
item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

Haven’t seen more then 3 players last few days, never seen owner either.
Can’t find the lunarrising point shop as well.

Read full topic

item.title: LunarRising - Need Staff - New Server - 317 - Customs!

item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

[quote=“ReePax, post:5, topic:554042”][quote author=nolan2131 link=topic=672965.msg4500264#msg4500264 date=1449587578]
I’ll join for owner rank, nothing less.
[/quote]
staff hunting bitch[/quote]

Dude, be quiet, you’re going to ruin my chance of getting owner rank.
